website_summaries.verdict: Handsome slippers with some nice features that are less costly than some by the brand, though you may run into some issues finding a size that fits.
pros: Offers a structured, slip-on style that provides a secure fit
Polartec fleece lining helps control moisture
Falls on the lower end of the price range of the Ugg slipper family
cons: Some consumers found they had to choose a size larger than normal, as they run quite small

customer_reviews.title: These slippers are very nice, but very narrow and sized incredibly wrong
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a 10.5 so I ordered an 11. They were too small! I went to my account, click on replace item. I opted for the size 12. The very NEXT day, UPS shows up at my door, takes the slippers and hands me a receipt. Then, the next day, I had a size twelve delivered! They fit! These slippers are very nice, but very narrow and sized incredibly wrong. BUT, they are nice! I'm pleased with how efficient the return process is. You always take a chance buying shoes online, but how easy was it to get a different size???!!! Very impressed!! Just order larger....
customer_reviews.author: wredwritinghood

customer_reviews.title: ... had high hopes being UGG I expected ultra plush comfortable slippers and they were not cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes being UGG I expected ultra plush comfortable slippers and they were not cheap. I ordered 1 size up and they are so tight and narrow. Not really a slipper because you cannot slip them on, they have to be pulled on like water shoes, you need to be sitting down.The material that covers the top of your foot is so stiff and tight with no give, super uncomfortable. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to slippers
customer_reviews.text: Almost didn't buy these because I didn't want to wear anything ugz. Then I made the distinction and all is good. They are more than the usual bargain slippers I bought, but the reviews were quite convincing and I'm on board. I'm usually a 9.5, I bought 10 based of the reviews and they fit pretty good. They are incredibly comfortable without being heavy or sweaty. The only downside in my opinion is that you can't "slip" them on, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: I suppose this isn't the worst thing since otherwise my feet might slip around in ...
customer_reviews.text: - They fit a hair tight. I wear 7.5/8.0 dress shoes and 8.5/9.0 running shoes, and the 9 Uggs are bit snug. Not too tight to be a concern, though. I suppose this isn't the worst thing since otherwise my feet might slip around in them. - They're quite warm, but my ankles get cold when wearing them, so I often have to wear thin socks with them. - Like most slippers, they're noisy when walking around the house. But this is par for the course with most slippers.
customer_reviews.author: owen_meany

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, very comfortable, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these slippers. As other reviewers have noted, they run a bit small. I'm a regular 10.5 and ordered size 11--the fit is just right (worn with socks) and they are very comfortable and warm. Given the brand, they probably are a bit over-priced, but the quality constructyion is definitely there, so I guess they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers, get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Numerous reviews have noted that UGG tends to run small. I usually wear a 10-10.5 and went with an 11 for these slippers. They fit just right (I wear them without socks), a 10 would definitely have been too small. They don't really stretch with wear, but they do conform to the shape of my feet over time. Very comfortable, just the right amount of warmth and the sole is nice. I highly recommend these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brohm

customer_reviews.title: SOOO comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my hubby for his birthday and he absolutely LOVES them. He wanted another pair that cost a bit more, but these seemed comparable. The wool makes them breathable but thy have a nice soft foot bed and the hard outer sole so he can wear them in the yard, even in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Could almost describe them as a comfortable, slip-on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have had them a week so far. They seem to be very well made and durable. Could almost describe them as a comfortable, slip-on shoe. I expect they'll last a long time as slippers being worn in the house. When I ordered them you could only order in full sized (not 1/2 sizes). I am a size 10, ordered a size 10, and they were way too small. The 11's fit snugly so my recommendation is to order at least 1 full size up, and if you are a 1/2 size, order 1 1/2 size up from your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: M Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 15 months ago and they are already falling apart. I like the slippers but they obviously are not made very well. The pair of Acorns they replaced were half the cost and had lasted me three times as long. I realize shoes wear out but it isn't like I am running marathons in them. They should be able to hold up to the demands of watching TV and walking to the refrigerator for a few years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Roe

customer_reviews.title: UGG-xactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. Well-constructed and fit snugly. A little warm for the summer months but still comfortable. They're sturdy enough that I often where them when I'm running errands. Look fine with blue jeans!
customer_reviews.author: KLG - Fla

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow, but good slipper.
customer_reviews.text: A bit narrow, but really enjoying them. Would love to see them offered in wide sizing. I ordered a size larger based on previous reviews to try to compensate for lack of wide. After a couple months, they are broken in a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love em. Warm, good traction and easy to slip on!
customer_reviews.author: ChuckM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for relaxing around the house
customer_reviews.text: At my wife's urging, these replaced another pair of slippers and they are everything she said they'd be. Warm, comfortable, and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Birkinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better from UGG
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are sized small and are not that comfortable. Very little cushioning in the soles. The only positive is that they are warm. I expected better from UGG.
customer_reviews.author: jlg

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item as the opening is a lot smaller than it appeared to the point I had to force my foot into the slipper. I was expecting the interior to have the soft sheepskin associated with Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wightman

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: These run very small . My husband ware’s a 10 , sometimes a 9 1/2 . These in a 10 were to small . Considerably small . If your going to purchase these , buy a size bigger .
customer_reviews.author: HelpingHand

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable slippers. However
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable slippers. However, you can't just slip them off and on like other slippers. So they're not so good if you're getting up in the night. They run at least one half size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: So comfy & warm
customer_reviews.text: I luckily read the reviews so I saw that the fit was small. Even though they are mens slippers, I purchased them for me. I usually wear a women’s 91/2 but I ordered a size 9 in these & they were perfect. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get ones that are two sizes bigger than your actual shoe size, great quality slipper
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews stating that these slippers run small. My shoe size is a hard 10.5, I purchased size 12 and they fit very comfortably, if not SLIGHTLY loose, and are very good quality. Great for around the house. I would certainly go two sizes above your actual shoe size should you get these. Mine are great, but I'm glad I read the reviews or I would clearly have had way too small of a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ely

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a value slipped that fits nicely to your feet comfortabley yet very secure. I like my pair.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous content

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but started falling apart after a few months of wear
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these slippers -- very comfortable. But after a few months of regular wear, the fabric started pulling apart on one of the slippers. I couldn't recommend based on that alone.
customer_reviews.author: TheVille84

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers on the market, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are, by far, the best I've ever owned. They're like a shoe. Very sturdy, yet comfortable as hell. Just be sure to order at least a size larger because they don't break in as easily as cheaper slippers do. They do break in somewhat though. Just enough to make them fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler2018

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Best slippers I ever purchased! Great quality very comfortable and keep my old feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper.  I am a size 12 D and I ordered 13 in these, they fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12 D with athletic shoes so I bought a size 13 in these and they fit perfect. They are very comfortable and seem to be made very well. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the way the slipper feels when on but it is hard to get on if you’re not very flexible. The shoe looks nice on and we got the shoe for a long hospital stay.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves these! They are very nice looking and comfy too! He likes that he can walk outside in them too! Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: teacher4life

customer_reviews.title: nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: fit well, good quality. They dont breathe, so my feet sweat!
customer_reviews.author: homeschool mom

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, stylish and will definitely order them again
customer_reviews.text: No doubt when I first put the slipper on it felt somewhat snug and smaller than a typical size 11, however they have quickly formed and fitted perfectly to my feet. They are very comfortable, stylish and will definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: "pistol921"

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and made well
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little snug, and I have narrow feet. Very comfortable and made well. Would by again, but a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Van1

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever.
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on air. I absolutely love these slippers. I did order a size up. But then again, I order a size up now for all my footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uggs for the Hubbs
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these, loves these, and we never speak of the fact that he is a proud wearer of Uggs. 10/10 would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaks

customer_reviews.title: Careful of the size
customer_reviews.text: They fit snug especially if you wear with socks. Without socks they are comfortable if still a bit snug. They offer more than a traditional slipper as they can be worn outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G.

customer_reviews.title: Tight around the ankles for now...
customer_reviews.text: Seems that it will be comfortable when they stretch out, but taking awhile. Tight around the ankles for now...
customer_reviews.author: Gr8penut

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slippers, but order size up
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but recommend ordering a size up, usually wear a men’s size 10 shoe, 11s fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Too small, needed to order probable 1 and 1/2 size largwe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice slipper...may run a half size small. Looks like very good Ugg quality!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Holdren

customer_reviews.title: Nice suede ugg hans slippers
customer_reviews.text: Nice suede ugg hans slippers. They are a little tight up top, but after I get my foot in they fit as described.
customer_reviews.author: Toph

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My husband won’t take these off! He says that are the most comfortable slippers and they don’t make his feet sweat!
customer_reviews.author: servio a. wilches

customer_reviews.title: Good Slipper for the Price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good Slipper for the Price. Would buy again. Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ChiliDog

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size i normally wear, initially a little tight mid foot but after some breakin fits great.
customer_reviews.author: L and C S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Slipper!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a great price. Fit is about a half size small. These slippers are warm but not too warm, I never find my feet sweating like some other brands I've used in the past. The slippers are also very light and most importantly very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Berke

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but tight
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are comfy, and warm. The problem is putting them on. It's a tight fit just getting your foot in.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny I. Gallegos.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13 in all shoes and these fit perfectly, even with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Malpaso

customer_reviews.title: Built for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Relaxing and very comfortable, well worth the purchase. Seem durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: jy78

customer_reviews.title: Nice UGG slippers
customer_reviews.text: Had to size up a tad small for my father. He loves them. High quality slippers. UGG cost more but they’re high quality
customer_reviews.author: Dang U 812

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes, Perfect Fit, actually they look better in person than they do on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it’s the most comfortable shoe/ slippers he’s ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stock

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a softer felt slipper, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a softer felt slipper, but when the pair of Hanz slippers arrived, they were too narrow (despite my ordering a size larger than normal), with a quite stiff and uncomfortable upper. Returning them....:(
customer_reviews.author: Planetjack

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical as I don't like UGGs like my kids but these are great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I don't like UGGs like my kids but these are great, fit well (everyone says go up a size and I did which fit like a glove) Warm, comfortable, sometimes i forget i am wearing a slipper they are that durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slippers.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable after a short break in period.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small order up a size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two sizes larger. Too big, returned for one size larger fit perfect very comfy
customer_reviews.author: john a. reich

customer_reviews.title: Women can wear these slippers also!
customer_reviews.text: These may be men's slippers but I bought them for myself and want another pair! They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Zigo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but a little snug
customer_reviews.text: Very nice , but a little snug, definitely run small. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holt

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice but run really small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice but run really small. Bought 1/2 size larger and couldn't even get my foot all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: All I wear around the house are slippers,got tired of paying for new cheap ones every couple of months so I followed the wife's lead and bout uggs,could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: CHAD HUFF

customer_reviews.title: UGG Slippers - Warm and Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: The UGG slippers are great. Very warm and a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Coolpapa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great slipper, good fit, quality construction. Well worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: Best slippers ever, the one thing that it feel a bit tight on the top but other them that worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Husband says he wishes he had bought them sooner. Loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Williams

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars - They run a little small
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. They do run about a half size small.
customer_reviews.author: Regis Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Very Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit like a glove. Easy to slip on and look great.
customer_reviews.author: LuTiger

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 12.... I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12.... I Ordered a size 13... they fit but are a bit snug with thicker socks. Hope they stretch a bit
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I saw that they run small, they do. Decent slipper for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please e mail me a return slip. The slippers are too small. Gary P Sauerborn
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers, just be sure to size up.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfy and well built. So happy I read reviews though on running small. I’m a solid 9.5 and ordered an 11 based on reviews - they fit perfectly. Overall great value but no chance they would have fit if I ordered my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: MNice

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are a little narrow in the toe but otherwise really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. The foot opening is a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny E

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy them.
customer_reviews.text: These slippers do fit smaller than normal. Other than that, I enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Reed

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy just seems like they ran a tad bit small
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Nance

customer_reviews.title: All materials are the best
customer_reviews.text: I like because is comfortable and warm good for winter
customer_reviews.author: LICOS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Meg27

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an 11 and it was too tight on his foot for him to be comfortable. Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 11 shoe, I ordered an 11 and it was too tight on his foot for him to be comfortable. Runs small.
customer_reviews.author: K Olson

customer_reviews.title: Toe box small - big toe hits top
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is really small. I am a 10.5 in just about everything, and this is pretty small. If the toe box wasn't small, and my big toe didn't hit the top, it would fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: They fit like a slipper
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. But heed the advice, you must order one size up. They fit like a slipper, wear like a shoe. The only reason I didn't give a 5 is because I don't give 5s. These would have to come when called and gently slip on to my wiggling toes to get a 5. Fantastic quality product, you pay for it, but it delivers the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear a solid 10 in Nike, really any athletic shoe and 10 in the Ugg way too tight. Would recommend at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Reinert

customer_reviews.title: felt like my circulation was being cut off
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight on top, felt like my circulation was being cut off. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: WAYYY small and these shoes are faked made in China
customer_reviews.author: Prime Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Kirby

product_meta.title: UGG Men's Hanz Slipper
product_meta.description: Slipper lined with polartec fleece for warmth and comfort
feature_bullets: Insole: cushioning foam lined with polartec fleece for warmth and moisture management
Outsole is treadlite by ugg to provide maximum cushioning and traction
